submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        a=Counter()
        b=[0]*(k+1)
        mx=inf
        n=len(nums)
        for i in range(n//2):
            a[abs(nums[i] -nums[n - i - 1])]+=1
            b[max(nums[i],k-nums[i],nums[n - i - 1],k-nums[n - i - 1])]+=1
        b=list(accumulate(b,initial=0))
        ans=n
        for i in range(k+1):
            ans=min(ans,n-a[i]-(b[-1]-b[i]))
        return ans
